function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of informal signs alongside professional signs may lead to confusion and inconsistent messaging regarding social distancing measures.","Impact":"Increased risk of misunderstanding and non-compliance with social distancing guidelines.","Mitigation":"Standardize and consolidate all signage to ensure consistent messaging and clear instructions for customers.","Technologies":"Digital signage solutions for centralized and synchronized content management.","People":"Customers, employees, and visitors to retail locations.","Owner":"Retailers and store managers."},{"Description":"Continued presence of informal signs may signal a lack of standardized health and safety measures, potentially undermining public confidence in the effectiveness of the retail environment's disease mitigation efforts.","Impact":"Decreased trust in the reliability and effectiveness of the retail environment's disease mitigation efforts.","Mitigation":"Implement a comprehensive audit of signage and update all informal signs to professional, standardized formats.","Technologies":"Print and design services for producing standardized, laminated signs.","People":"General public, government health officials, and public health agencies.","Owner":"Retailers and government health agencies."},{"Description":"The coexistence of informal and professional signs may create confusion and uncertainty for individuals navigating retail environments, leading to potential violations of social distancing guidelines.","Impact":"Increased risk of close contact and non-compliance with social distancing protocols, contributing to disease transmission.","Mitigation":"Establish clear guidelines for the use of signage and remove any conflicting or redundant signage from the retail environment.","Technologies":"Signage management software for tracking and updating signage content.","People":"Customers, employees, and visitors to retail locations.","Owner":"Retailers and store managers."}]}
